text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ecr/CodeSystem/us-ph-usage-context defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
triggering TriggeringThe artifact is applicable when identifying a triggering event.
supplemental SupplementalThe artifact is applicable only when determining whether an event is suspected reportable.

name: USPublicHealthUsageContext
title: US Public Health Usage Context
description: This code system contains codes that identify the use context of a valueset.

concept.definition: The artifact is applicable when identifying a triggering event.
The artifact is applicable only when determining whether an event is suspected reportable.
